title: 이달의소녀탐구 #487 (LOONA TV #487)
summary:
The photoshoot for [xx] begins with HeeJIn.
0:13 -- HyunJin: "I am waiting for my turn." Then she imitates a king: "Tell them come in".
0:19 -- She plays the piano and tries to recreate 'Around You'.
0:37 -- Choerry plays the theme song of Harry Potter on the piano but messes up. "Sorry. This is urgent. My piano playing is done~"
The episode ends along with HeeJin's photoshoot.
